product_desc:
A hybrid tech firm founded by serial tech entrepreneur Payam Zamani, One Planet Ops Inc. (OPO) consists of several successful operating technology companies and brands, an angel fund and a startup incubator. Its largest Internet brands operate in the automotive, real estate and home improvement industries and include Buyerlink.com, MerchantCircle.com and QualitySmith. 

One Planet Ops will operate, incubate and invest in Internet based businesses that have a significant promise for success—while attempting to run these businesses in a humble spirit of sustainable service to humanity. OPO’s Innovation+Intention philosophy represents the firm’s core value that work performed in the spirit of service creates the highest and best expression of their professional and personal lives. By marrying those two forces—innovation and intention—OPO intends to unify capital and social capital.

Fore more information http://www.oneplanetops.com
high_concept: Hybrid tech firm: operating tech companies, an angel fund, and a startup incubator
name: One Planet Ops
